column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health announced this morning that Cambodia has one more confirmed case of COVID-19
column4: bringing the total number detected in the country since the outbreak to 103.------The patient is a 36-year-old woman staff member from ‘Star TV’ KTV in Poipet.------Of the 103 patients
column13: and 1 Chinese.------A further 8 people have now fully recovered
column14: bring the total to 21.------There have been no confirmed deaths in Cambodia.------ ------VERY DETAILED MAP OF OUTBREAK
